item.title: NCC Bank supports ‘SeaSafe Lifeguard’ initiative at Cox’s Bazar under its CSR
item.description: As part of its Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) initiatives, NCC Bank has extended support to the “SeaSafe Lifeguard” program operated by the Centre for Injury Prevention and Research, Bangladesh (CIPRB) at Cox’s Bazar sea beach, aiming to address drowning-related public heal

item.title: Islami Bank holds board meeting on Tuesday
item.description: A meeting of the board of directors of Islami Bank Bangladesh PLC was held on Tuesday at the Islami Bank Tower, according to a press release. Professor Dr M. Zubaidur Rahman, chairman of the bank, presided over the meeting. Mohammad KhurshidWahab, chairman of the executive committee, Md. Abdus Sal

item.title: Govt dismantles corrupt structure in power, energy sector: Adviser
item.description: Power, Energy and Mineral Resources Adviser Dr Muhammad Fouzul Kabir Khan on Tuesday said the interim government destroyed the long-standing corruption structure of power and energy sectors. “We have undertaken legal and institutional reform activities in the sector, leaving a transparent an

item.title: BRAC Bank inaugurates relocated Motijheel Branch in spacious premises
item.description: BRAC Bank has relocated its Motijheel Branch to spacious premises with more amenities to provide the best-in-class services and a delightful banking experience to its valued customers, according to a press release. item.title: Community Bank signs MoU with Project 2morrow for digital onboarding, inclusive financing drive
item.description: Community Bank Bangladesh PLC has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Project 2morrow Software Ltd to strengthen inclusive financing initiatives and enhance customer onboarding through advanced digital financial systems, according to a press release. item.title: Officials will face strict action if poll irregularities take place: Home Adviser
item.description: Home Adviser Lt Gen (retd.) Md. Jahangir Alam Chowdhury has warned that strict action will be taken against election officials and law enforcement personnel if any irregularities occur at polling stations during the 13th national election, including ballot box snatching or fake voting. He issued t

item.title: EU, Japanese election observation missions meet Prof Yunus
item.description: The EU Election Observer Mission (EU-EOM) paid a courtesy call on Chief Adviser Professor Muhammad Yunus at the State Guest House Jamuna on Tuesday. The Japanese Election Observation Mission also paid a courtesy call on the Chief Adviser separately, said the Chief Adviser’s press wing. The

item.title: 452nd board meeting of Al-Arafah Islami Bank held
item.description: 452nd Board meeting of Al-Arafah Islami Bank PLC was held on Tuesday at the Banks’ head office, according to a press release. item.title: Top U.S. immigration officials testify before lawmakers following killings in Minnesota
item.description: Top U.S. immigration officials are testifying before a congressional committee on Tuesday in the first such hearing since two U.S. citizens were killed in Minnesota and amid mounting opposition to President Donald Trump’s crackdown. item.title: Tarique Rahman to cast vote at Gulshan Model High School and College
item.description: The campaign and public outreach for the 13th National Parliamentary Election, scheduled for February 12, have ended. Now, it is time for voters to cast their ballots. BNP Chairman Tarique Rahman will cast his vote at the Gulshan Model High School and College center, located on Road 86, Block 1/D

item.title: EU lawmakers approve fast-track deportations of rejected asylum seekers
item.description: European lawmakers approved changes to the European Union asylum system on Tuesday, paving the way for fast-track deportations of rejected asylum seekers, underlining the rise in anti-immigration politics over the past decade. item.title: Interim government reveals advisors’ asset details before election
item.description: The interim government has disclosed the details of assets owned by its advisors and their spouses.
